title: One planet - two worlds: five minutes to midnight
creator_credit: Alan Hart, Ian McFarlane and World Focus
brief_description: Examines the crisis of world hunger and poverty. Considers the economic division of the world and points out the possibility of a world catastrophe if the division continues unchecked. Stresses the need to launch a global attack on the problem to ensure human survival. Suitable for upper secondary level.
